rules_text:
Break [i](When this creature deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one other target creature.)[/i]
As long as it’s your turn, creatures you control with +1/+1 counters on them have first strike.
notes: 2.2.0: Removed Heropon Selection for Colony Commander. Helps encourage break and functions as a pretty generically good creature.
